title: INF Form
description: Individual Notification Form - Required for all placement registrations. This form contains your personal and academic details for company applications.

title: JNF Form
description: Job Notification Form - Essential document for job applications through the placement cell. Contains detailed job descriptions and requirements.

title: Placement Cell Brochure
description: Complete overview of our placement cell services, statistics, and procedures. Essential reading for understanding the placement process.

title: AIPC Guidelines
description: All India Placement Cell Guidelines - Official rules and regulations governing the placement process. Must read for all students.

title: Library Resources
description: Comprehensive collection of placement preparation materials, interview guides, and company-specific resources available in our library.

title: Video Resources
description: Video tutorials, mock interviews, company presentations, and placement guidance sessions. Perfect for visual learning and interview preparation.
